closed_reason: Enhanced help text already implemented by previous iterations when adding workflow flags. All 6 commands (create, approve, reject, list, next, note) have custom fs.Usage functions with USAGE, description, FLAGS, and EXAMPLES sections.
description:
Implement the enhanced help text format from AGENT_HUMAN_WORKFLOW.md

Current help is just flag definitions. The design doc proposes:

1. USAGE section showing command signature
2. FLAGS section with grouped flags and multi-line descriptions  
3. DESCRIPTION section explaining behavior
4. EXAMPLES section with practical usage

Example format for tk create:
```
tk create - Create a new tick

USAGE:
    tk create <title> [flags]

FLAGS:
    -d, --description string   Tick description
    --requires string          Pre-declared approval gate: approval, review, content
                               Tick will route to human after agent completes
    --awaiting string          Immediate human assignment: work, approval, ...
                               Tick will be skipped by agent until human responds

EXAMPLES:
    tk create "Fix login bug" -d "Users can't login"
    tk create "Update auth flow" --requires approval
```

Commands needing enhanced help:
- create (with --requires, --awaiting)
- approve
- reject  
- list (with --awaiting filter)
- next (with --awaiting flag)
- note (with --from flag)

Implementation approach:
- Override FlagSet.Usage to provide custom formatting
- Or create help subcommand that outputs formatted help
title: Implement expanded help text for CLI commands
